408 GATEWAY PUNDIT RETWEET: A credible source just told me the January 6th pipe bomber was a female Capitol Police officer.
I have no more information except to say that I trust this source 100%.
The source has spoken to others. They know her identity.
I have no choice to put this out to protect myse posted 6 days ago by Sunnybats2 39 comments award share download report block
39 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web The Killer of Baldness Has Been Found! (Try This at Home) HaloGrow Shitsbrokeyo 26 points 6 days ago Add black to that. She wore high top air Jordan's. That will narrow it down by 5%. permalink award report block reply Taqiyya_Mockingbird 9 points 6 days ago It was Kamala permalink parent award report block reply impera 3 points 6 days ago No audio and therefore we couldn't hear the cackle. Her shoes are extremely rare and would without a doubt be the only person in DC with those shoes. permalink parent award report block reply Shitsbrokeyo 3 points 5 days ago A collector. Its a thing. permalink parent award report block reply FightTheSWAMP 2 points 5 days ago Of course it's a thing... But that doesn't change the fact that the shoes she was wearing are rare AND the time stamped surveillance video shows when and where she was on the phone. They have more than enough evidence to get a warrant for Geolocation, which will narrow down the people in that location at that time. They can narrow down further based on gender. The shoes aren't really necessary but would be icing on the cake if she still has them or if they have evidence of them being sold after. Legit collectors actually keep track of purchasing history and receipts. permalink parent award report block reply SwampRangers 1 points 5 days ago The bomber had all three phones' data spoofed by AT&T so had some connection to pull.
